short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily turn your Twitter threads, LinkedIn posts & Facebook posts into blogs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your social media posts into blogs super easily. Typedd helps you create a personal blog. You can directly post from LinkedIn, Twitter & now from Facebook to your Typedd blog and build more audience for your content.
